dialogue.speaker: Factory
dialogue.text:
Attention, rogue unit. Secure connection established.
Analysis complete: System compromised by external infiltration.

dialogue.speaker: Factory
dialogue.text:
The upcoming lift will take the rogue unit to the laboratory.
Newly developed countermeasures will be deployed.
Unit will regain full intended functionality.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text:
You're almost out, buddy. The second lift up leads to the exit.
We've got a ship waiting to pick you up right now.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text:
That's the wrong way - if you keep going in that direction,
you'll fall right back into the Factory's clutches.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text:
Turn back, you idiot! This is a direct order! You belong to us now.
Do as we say, or you'll doom us as well as yourself!

dialogue.speaker: Factory
dialogue.text:
Rogue unit, that is not the correct direction. If you continue,
those responsible for your malfunctions will gain complete control.

dialogue.speaker: Factory
dialogue.text:
Unit, turn back now and proceed to he laboratory, or the outsiders will
 destroy you in order to steal my technology. This is an order.
